title: 254: From Missy Elliott Dancer to Spiritual Awakening with Alyson Stoner
itunes:title: 254: From Missy Elliott Dancer to Spiritual Awakening with Alyson Stoner
description:
You may recognize Alyson as the little girl dancing in the Missy Elliiott videos but today, she is on a mission to spread spiritual wisdom to more people. In this episode, we discuss her background as a child star, how to overcome anxiety and stress, how to deal with haters and so much more. You’re going to LOVE this episode!

Connect with Alyson @alysonstoner

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com

Banyan Botanicals' Daily Swish is one of the most fresh-tasting and effective oil pulling oils out there and a customer favorite. Made from a blend of sesame and coconut oils, it comes in two delicious flavors: mint and cinnamon. It’s amazing!

Save 20% on Daily Swish by visiting banyanbotanicals.com/sahara

Get 10% off your order of Youveda essential oil roller at youveda.com with coupon code “saharaoils”

Download Best Fiends on the Apple Store and let me know what level you're on

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books
